name: Last Stand of Green Glade
description:
A clicker RTS, where you must click to collect resources, upgrade your town buildings and send out your warriors to fend off the invaders pouring from the portals!

Controls:

[Left mouse click] to collect resources from the resources in the field.

[Shift + Left mouse click] to select and control your buildings and units.

[Right mouse click] to tell units where to move.

You can also [left mouse click] on buildings to make them work faster, and on your units to make them perform better!

Luca Rizzo  - Luca Rizzo Composer : Composer/Music and SFX

Alexander Chernyshev - https://veshyn.itch.io/  : Graphics and UI Artist

DannyWebbie- https://dannywebbie.itch.io/ : Programmer
